## **Prerequisites**

Before starting this module make sure you have:

-   access to the book *Nield, T. (2022). Essential Math for Data Science. O'Reilly Media, Inc.*

-   a data science environment [setup](https://businessdatasolutions.github.io/datamining-course/book/setup.html){target="_blank"}

In week 1 and 2 we'll be covering chapter 1 with the following topics:

1.  [**Number Theory**](numbertheory.html)

2.  [**Order of Operations**](orderofoperations.html)

3.  [**Variables**](https://learning.oreilly.com/library/view/essential-math-for/9781098102920/ch01.html#idm45252832469312)

4.  [**Functions**](https://learning.oreilly.com/library/view/essential-math-for/9781098102920/ch01.html#idm45252829259280)

5.  [**Summations**](https://learning.oreilly.com/library/view/essential-math-for/9781098102920/ch01.html#idm45252826042848)

6.  [**Exponents**](https://learning.oreilly.com/library/view/essential-math-for/9781098102920/ch01.html#idm45252828538032)

7.  [**Logarithms**](https://learning.oreilly.com/library/view/essential-math-for/9781098102920/ch01.html#idm45252823799024)

8.  [**Euler's Number and Natural Logarithms**](https://learning.oreilly.com/library/view/essential-math-for/9781098102920/ch01.html#idm45252823468736)

    1.  [**Euler's Number**](https://learning.oreilly.com/library/view/essential-math-for/9781098102920/ch01.html#idm45252826648304)

    2.  [**Natural Logarithms**](https://learning.oreilly.com/library/view/essential-math-for/9781098102920/ch01.html#idm45252826647424)

9.  [**Limits**](https://learning.oreilly.com/library/view/essential-math-for/9781098102920/ch01.html#idm45252826293904)

10. [**Derivatives**](https://learning.oreilly.com/library/view/essential-math-for/9781098102920/ch01.html#idm45252826120304)

    1.  [**Partial Derivatives**](https://learning.oreilly.com/library/view/essential-math-for/9781098102920/ch01.html#idm45252825557952)

    2.  [**The Chain Rule**](https://learning.oreilly.com/library/view/essential-math-for/9781098102920/ch01.html#idm45252825380896)

11. [**Integrals**](https://learning.oreilly.com/library/view/essential-math-for/9781098102920/ch01.html#idm45252825129584)
